website_summaries.verdict: Crystal-clear 4K that won’t break the bank.
pros: This 27-inch 4K monitor is an absolute steal for the money
It boasts 98% of the sRGB color gamut and HDR 10 compatibility for incredible picture quality
It’s also a fantastic gaming choice for the 16:9 aspect ratio, as it features both Radeon FreeSync and a dedicated Game Mode for increased performance
cons: This monitor has just two HDMI ports and one DisplayPort

customer_reviews.title: Can’t take my eyes off this beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a primary display for my PS4 Pro. Pros: - Fast response time - HDR looks gorgeous - Screen size is perfect if sitting 3-4 ft away - LG had gamers in mind when creating this beauty. Cons: - Owned the unit for less than 24 hours and it developed a small group of dead pixels in the center of screen. Amazon handled the situation professionally. I had Amazon exchange the unit because I believe the picture quality this unit provides is worth it. Contacted LG initially with the issue and they weren’t willing to provide quick turn times and customer service was unpleasant. Thank you Amazon for being uber awesome as always.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this monitor. Use it for my Xbox One X and Ps4 Pro. The HDR pops nicely and the monitor notifies you when it is being used. I bought this monitor after using a Benq rl2755 for the longest time and haven’t noticed any more input lag than before. I’m still hitting all my combos nicely on USF4, GGXRD and T7. On X1X Tomb Raider looks fantastic and is noticeably different on the different graphics options. I love that the screen goes completely vertical as well! Gunbird for Nintendo Switch is a blast vertical as well as Namco Museum. All in all definitely worth the money spent. Won’t be looking for another monitor anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect monitor for console gaming and hi-end video editing
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible monitor! I was looking for a monitor that i could use with my Xbox One, but also wanted a monitor that I could use for hi-end video editing. This monitor covers both my needs perfectly. The colors when compared my MacBook Pro are nearly identical. I researched monitors for weeks on end and finally found this one. If you are a video editor, then you cant go wrong with this monitor. If you're a console gamer then look no further, this is the monitor for you.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic colors, picture quality and build quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a high quality monitor for my laptop. After going to an electronics store and looking at 10 monitors side-x-side, this very clearly stood out as the highest quality colors and build quality in the group. I'm a developer, so I can't speak to response and games etc but after years of being used the very highest quality MacBook Pro displays, most monitors disappoint. Usually the text isn't high enough quality and it creates frustration and eye-strain ... But this one doesn't. It's gorgeous, it makes my work look better :) Buy it, you'll not be disappointed, its worth every penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: tremendusapps

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for ps4 pro!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my ps4 pro and I'm loving it so far. I wanted a monitor that looked as good as my samsung 4k hdr QLED TV. Dark scenes are not as dark but I feel the colors look just as amazing, response times are great, and everything is super sharp and crisp. I also like simulated hdr effect mode. One of the first games I tried was Monster Hunter Would, which is already known to have poor hdr support although is does have it. I turned off hdr in the game menu and simulated hdr on the monitor and, to me at least, it look as if that what it should have looked in the first place lol.
customer_reviews.author: edgar c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Xbox one x, PS4 Pro!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect companion for my gaming consoles, if ur a gamer ull love it..even netflix looks great! I connected to my windows laptop and its great with that too..4k,amazing colors,ips panel.(not washed out or dull), hdr kicks in automatically, unique stand. Has some cool HDR modes. This version does not have speakers. (Uk850 has). I have played battlefield 1, forza 7, gran turismo sport, wildlands, gears, all look beautiful and play flawlessly..overall i am very happy and definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dushyant

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my 11 year-old Mac Pro and Samsung monitor with a 2018 MacBook Pro and this LG display, and this monitor is wonderful! Crystal clear and vivid colors. I'm connecting it to the laptop through a CalDigit TS3+ docking station using the LG-supplied DisplayPort cable, and so far I haven't had any issues. The key I've found to having the display be recognized immediately is to power the display first, then turn on the laptop. Once macOS boots up and recognizes the monitor, I can close the laptop lid if desired.
customer_reviews.author: CeeJayLex

customer_reviews.title: Impressive but avoid - bleeding corners
customer_reviews.text: Incredible monitor but after 14 months the upper corners started to bleed red. Started out being really small but has continued to grow and is so annoying! Contacted LG support - 1 year warranty expired - will need to send back and pay for repairs. I use this mainly for work and gaming on the side so sending it in and waiting weeks isn’t something I really want to do. Have always bought lg monitors/TVs but this experience has me for the first time shopping around for other brand options. So bummed bc for that first year I was incredibly happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Powered off after 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.text: After talking with LG and no fix was available I was told to return the monitor. This monitor does not work with Mac OS.
customer_reviews.author: Birdieman

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL for 5 days and then failed
customer_reviews.text: I have put in for a replacement and will update this review when it arrives. Initial impressions were over the top good. Using 3 inputs and moving around between them is pretty quick. I wish I had PIP but that's a very minor issue. Colors were vibrant out of the box and easily tweaked via monitor controls. Software was okay. I hope the replacement is just as good but instead lasts for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Horwath

customer_reviews.title: Not willing to fulfill one year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: HDMI 1 no longer produces color. Instead of waiting until HDMI 2 did the same thing or worse. I decided to claim the 1 year warranty. I use this monitor every day. The only other device I have is an OLED TV, and I am not trying to cause burn in while it is off for repair. So I asked for a replacement and I was told no. I will never buy an LG monitor again. Besides the bad warranty experience: It does not have 5ms response time, freesync option has never shown up on my pc or xbox, the hdr is broken, and the blacks look gray or very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Camel

customer_reviews.title: Great HDR picture, and it works...most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this display is great. There is definitely a noticeable, and quite beautiful, difference with HDR content. However, I am experiencing issues with the screen flickering, like it’s losing signal, many times I use it. I have this display connected to my PS4 Pro, and this flickering only seems to happen when I’m playing HDR content using the HDMI 2.0 connection. I’m not sure if it’s the LG display or the PS4 Pro, I haven’t tried the other HDMI port on the display yet to see if it works better, but it’s still a disappointing issue for what would otherwise be an outstanding display.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: horrable monitor but died in 2 month
customer_reviews.text: i did not like this monitor from day one but i was happy when i died after 2 months.. but it was before the return date...back it went to the junk yard where it belongs.. i dont understand these good reviews this thing is trash.
customer_reviews.author: krout

customer_reviews.title: Love it -- but 60hz is not great for fast motion
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those rare people that in the days of CRTs would get significant visual strain from a 60hz monitor. This largely is not a problem with LCD displays because they don't introduce black frames (at least not most of them). However with this monitor when playing full screen video or a fast paced game, the refresh rate is apparent and causes eyestrain. I love literally EVERYTHING else about this monitor. It's unbelievably clear. I love the matte screen finish. The color reproduction is fantastic for creators. It has good OSD controls. It's a solid monitor, but I wouldn't buy it if you're looking to do any amount of fast paced gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Monitor died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a first for me when it comes to monitors. It started to flicker, then blacked out and shut down for good. Completely dead and unable to power it up again. Had to buy a box and packing and ship it back to LG and haven't heard from them in the last 10 days (don't throw out the box until the warranty is over). Luckily, it's a second monitor. Can't recommend it, but I liked it when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Just a Impressive Display! A++
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is absolutely gorgeous! I mean the image/picture quality is outstanding! with a good calibration software you can adjust this to be 100%ARGB and that is awesome for photographers. you can also adjust it to be 100% DCP3 and 709 100% at least my screen could. only bad think is it does not have AMD Freesync which I thought it said in the add it did!. but I cannot complain. it's amazing for content creation and consumption. I love it. On a side note! if your desk is not deeper than 2feet you don't need a bigger screen than 27" anything bigger you should really be sitting closer to 3.5-4 feet away from it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors, until I tried to add a third. Quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have been running two of these screens for about a year now and I have never been more satisfied with my displays. Then I tried to add a third. The first one had fuzzieness, and its white balance was heavily blue and adjustments couldn't correct it. Amazon of course offered a replacement, but the replacement had rows of green and blue pixels stuck on throughout (though it did fix the white balance and fuzieness issues). Also, both of the new monitors had stands about 1/2 inch shorter than older other two, despite them being the exact same model. So overall while I am satisfied with the monitors when they are operating correctly, the quality control is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome display, but quality control issues hurt the experience
customer_reviews.text: Great 4k monitor! Everything looks beautiful! Games look great. Freesync works okay. Still get screen tearing here and there. The main issues that I have is with quality control. My first monitor had dust bits imbedded in the screen. I ordered a replacement to fix that. However, now I have a dead pixel and a small dust bit on the screen. Its frustrating as over all the monitor is great. I just shouldn’t have to deal with this problem. This is the first monitor that I’ve used that had dust settle in the LCD reflective layer itself. Two stars for quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: bought it when it is on sale with $280. The value for money is excellent for this display. However, do note a few things before you buy: 1. this monitor does NOT support refresh rate boosting. For many displays, if they are labeled 60Hz, you can actually boost them to ~75-80Hz. However, after testing on Windows 10 this monitor is fixed at 60Hz. This can be a major flaw if you are a gamer. 2. This monitor supports AMD freesync technology. However, do note that if your computer has a NVIDIA graphics card instead of AMD one, freesync will NOT work on this machine no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 27" 4k monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a 27GL850 to replace a 24UD58-B and an old Dell U2414H that was having problems waking from sleep. This is clearly better quality than the 24UD58-B and the additional screen real estate is nice. It's plenty bright enough even in a lit room without having to increase the brightness. I'm not using the stand but from what I could tell it looked like a high quality stand, sturdy and with plenty of adjustment. I only wish it took a standard C13 plug.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with LG
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in late 2018, expecting it to last several years. The picture quality is (was) excellent. Connectivity is good. I like the controls and menus. However, after less than 2 years of light use, 2 corners have a permanent red hue and there are visible stuck pixels. This isn’t a cheap monitor, and it should have lasted longer. It’s usable, though obviously annoying. I expected more from LG.
customer_reviews.author: engineering_enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect monitor for gaming and work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I use this for two things: 1. 4K gaming with my Xbox One X. Although the screen could be a bit brighter, the picture quality is amazing. I don’t get any screen tearing or signing fang drop in frames or even any noticeable response lag over my previous 1080p monitor that had 1ms. FYI, I do get 60fps at 4K with hdr playing my Xbox One X. 2. Connecting my MacBook Pro via hdmi to usb-c. No complaints here. As I’ve mentioned the only thing stopping this monitor from being perfect is the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: A.M

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for MacBook Pro (2018)
customer_reviews.text: Using this monitor with my MacBook Pro (2018) and it is perfect. The size lets me work in Word and Excel, or two Word documents. I can also work in the various Adobe apps and preview the work on the MacBook set off to the side. I wanted affordable, with lots of space. This monitor has been one of the best purchases I've made for the home office.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a programmer, and need screen space. I have Visual Studio, SQL Management Studio, client designs, and a bunch of other stuff open at once - and need to be able to refer from one thing to another quickly. This monitor has the detail to show tons of stuff on screen at once. It, plus the laptop display and another monitor, get the job done like a champ! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: T. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Not great support for multiple inputs
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fine, and I bought this display, which costs extra, because it supports portrait orientation. However, it's not very well thought out for multiple inputs, because it doesn't auto-switch. Most displays I know will automatically and temporarily switch input if the selected one has no signal. Which is very convenient when you have two machines and you power them one at a time. This display requires switching inputs manually each time, which gets old, because the UI and joystick for the OSD are multi-level and clunky, and the OSD is always locked in landscape orientation. So good panel, but basically mediocre design.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Console Gaming Upgrade screen
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a dual monitor setup for my PC but instead of getting the same monitor (LG 27GL83A-B, great btw if you need a budget 144hz monitor ), I decided to go with a 4K one since PS5 is just months away and wouldn't hurt to upgrade my PS Pro visuals. And boy I'm glad I did. The colors look way sharper and crisper compared to my big screen(HDR is just ok though but I wasn't really expecting it to blow me away for this price), makes me feel I've been console gaming the wrong way for the last 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Howard H. Dean

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HIGHLY underrated
customer_reviews.text: PHENOMENAL picture when hooked up to my Xbox One X. HDR looks amazing, brightness is plenty. Only regret is not getting one with speakers. BUY THIS MONITOR - you will NOT be disappointed, especially for this price!
customer_reviews.author: C K S

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor to use with MacBook
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is it! The USB-C makes it perfect to charge my MacBook pro and allows me to be more productive. I have a much bigger screen to with with when doing my school work! Not only that, but it is so crisp! Everything is clear! Not to mention, when I play PS4 games, geeez. Dope monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Salas

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is phenomenal in regard to image, text, size and productivity
customer_reviews.text: Look, I researched over a month, everything you can imagine I read, watch. I was in doubt to go to 34, 38, all the wide wide out there, I’m short sided, I care for image quality, crisp text. And man! What a hell of choice I made!!!!! This monitor is phenomenal in regard to image, text, size and productivity. Look nice on the table. I can open 2-3 screens on it. I am very happy. This is one of those things you buy and simply feels right, good and that well done job feeling! I did change the stand though as I needed more mobility, I bought a human scale arm. Just beautiful both together!
customer_reviews.author: Abinadab

customer_reviews.title: Great other than the flash lighting/light bleeding.
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I'm not real happy with the flash lighting or backlight bleeding even with brightness all the way down. Fortunately it's only noticeable on dark scenes or black screened but it is noticeable and distracting. I guess you can expect as such for a non OLED screen. I took some images using my pixel 2 one with and one without night site. To be fair these images look more dramatic than the actual effect but it is definitely there.
customer_reviews.author: CoopOfTheDay

customer_reviews.title: this is the one! Perfect for IMAC 5k companion and for my work PC laptop
customer_reviews.text: I got the vesa hdr 400. I am not doing any editing of videos or photos on my computer. just a regular work and surfing the internet kinda thing. I Love this monitor because the quality and picture sizing can be changed to match my 5K monitor, so it looks like windows transition perfectly in between. picture quality is great too. no complaints..
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I like this monitor a lot. All these are excellent: - resolution and clarity - colors and color mode choices provided in the menus - stand design and adjustability What I don't like about it is the timeout feature of it that causes the thing to sleep so friggin fast you don't have time to get through the initial settings menu choices to get where you need to go and make changes like changing the picture color mode or what not. This aspect of this is moronic and highly annoying and I would have given this monitor five stars if not for this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget 4K monitor with DisplayPort.
customer_reviews.text: A low cost solution so I could go from a two monitor setup to one. Due to space changes on my desk, I had to change my previous two 2K monitor set-up to one. Since my older computer only supports 4K by DisplayPort I decided to find a reasonably priced monitor with relatively accurate color science. This is it. Very happy with it, not sure I would trust it totally versus a $1000 monitor in the color accuracy department but it certainly is very solid. In fact I am buying a second one (this purchase) to complement my eGPU office setup.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hohauser

customer_reviews.title: Very good 4K monitor for cost
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The 4K picture quality is great. Very simple to make adjustments using the "joy stick" located on the bottom of the monitor. Using it with a MacBook Pro. Connection was simple. I purchased (separately) a Display Port Adapter capable of supporting 4K resolution rather than use the provided HDMI. Do yourself a favor and spend $15 on that cable. Cons: Cosmetically: The monitor has a white plastic back rather than a black plastic back which I don't particularly like, but I knew that going into the purchase. Functionally: There are no USB ports on the back of this monitor which would have been really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor for price
customer_reviews.text: I am please with my purchase. I have been using this monitor for 10 months with multiple laptops and desktops and having 3 ports is a plus. I had the monitor connected to a docking station via display port, to an old desktop via HDMI, and to my work laptop via HDMI due the work machine not "liking" my docking station and DP combo. Anyway, the docking station/DP is fine with 2 other laptops. The 9 year old desktop (now retired and recycled) could only manage 1080 resolution which looked horrible on this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for Macbook Pro users
customer_reviews.text: For a reason that I do not fully understand, this LG 4k panel does not provide 4k resolution when connected to a MacBook Pro 13-inch, 2017 running macOS Mojave version 10.14.5. The "default display" only provides 1920 x 1080, and when I attempt to set the resolution to the scaled setting of 3840 x 2160, the sizing of everything (fonts, apps, literally everything being displayed) is microscopic. I plugged in a coworker's PC and he didn't have an issue running the full 4k resolution with standard sizing, so definitely a mac only problem. Also, the refresh rate is painfully low.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Forman

customer_reviews.title: Feedback after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing. Very clear and easy to use. I use it for both work and personal and can switch easily between multiple computers. One thing I still dont get is why there is a monitor for a computer vs just buying a really good big tv? You can get this quality in a super high def tv for much less and it has the same compatibility. I'm sure someone smarter than me can opine. But, if you are in the market for a monitor, this is a good one
customer_reviews.author: Mng123

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this monitor. Compared to a BenQ EL2870U (which I have next to it as second monitor), the LG image quality is superior. Love the adjustable stand and that you can rotate it to portrait mode. For the price, it is a great monitor. One thing I noticed with any 4k monitor actually, is that to get the get image quality you should use a display port. I use a usb-c to display port cable to connect it to my Mac Mini.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Duran

customer_reviews.title: Everything is white washed, text is hard to read, bad picture compared to my old monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this monitor in and test it out. I use my monitor for gaming and work. This monitor is awful, one of the worst I have seen. The monitor is so bright pains your eyes, when you turn it down enough to not hurt your eyes you can't see the screen because it's to dim. There is not amount of adjusting in the OS or the monitor settings that make it look good. I spent about 30 minutes trying to tune it. It looks like the cheapo that I bought and regretted. I wouldn't pay $50 for this thing. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Having massive flickering problems already
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in January and im having flickering and other problems and artifacts with the monitor.... I need to contact someone who can help me.
customer_reviews.author: Boris L

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!  HDR effect looks amazing for a lot of games!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my Xbox One X and I had to play with the settings to understand how the monitor worked. First of all, the monitor doesn’t let you completely customize every setting. Some settings are fixed and if you want to use HDR effect mode (recommended for games) the brightness is naturally lower for a lot of games which I don’t like but just remember, you need to adjust the brightness from the game settings. I’d recommend vivid setting for movies and tv otherwise it’s gonna look too dark and unnaturally sharp. But for games HDR is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing HDR.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sadly was cheaper days after, but it's life. I Play using a PlayStation Pro and I will never play using TVs again. The immersion experience is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Avila

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous display. 0 input lag!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous display! Im using this as a second screen in my media room for xbox one x gameplay as well a secondary tv via roku. The picture quality absolutely crushes my 50" 4k vizio thanks to HDR and the input lag when gaming when freesync is on is non-existent... I researched a ton of monitors before settling on this one but boy am I glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Decent monitor, great buy for entry level performance!
customer_reviews.text: Decent monitor, entry level, great for watching content or doing creative work. I also like the ease of use with the single joystick control on the bottom. Compared to my other higher end 1440p IPS displays the picture quality is alright to pretty decent depending on what you’re doing - But even with the 4K resolution, it simply does’t compare. I picked this one up on a warehouse deal because I built my wife a new system to replace her old 2013 iMac and for her needs I think it’ll be perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has good picture quality and brightness. When I mirror my MacBook Pro to this monitor the quality is perfect. The only reason why I’m giving it a 3 stars is because the sound of the monitor doesn’t work. When I choose the monitor speaker as sound output, I don’t hear anything. I checked the volume and it is up but still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Niti

customer_reviews.title: Buggy software
customer_reviews.text: Monitor keeps switching to "HDR Vivid" mode every time I return to the computer in the morning even though I have never used HDR on it and the computer does not have HDR enabled. The only way to fix it is to then turn HDR on then off on the computer. It's not a great monitor regardless. Soft picture, muted colors, low accuracy. It feels like something you'd get for free with your cheap Dell, not something to pay $400 for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dremeaux

customer_reviews.title: Looked Great While It Worked Properly
customer_reviews.text: I was using the monitor with my Xbox One X and everything seemed great until the second day of use. The monitor developed a thin line of dead pixels on the bottom portion of the screen. The picture quality and build are awesome but that doesn't matter if it's going to come with manufacturer defects. I wanted to have it replaced with the same monitor but I noticed the merchant had changed from Amazon to another company and the price has gone up. This is the first time I have ever had to return something from Amazon and I'm bummed about it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I like how vibrant the colors output from this 4k monitor. I mainly use it for word processing programs, YouTube, Netflix, and light gaming. The OnScreen control from LG is as expected from any IPS type screen; multiple split screen options and you can pre-program applications for each window at startup. Pretty useful! Also, I like how there are a variety of options to control the wide color gamut and the HDR features; you can choose different types for each split screen. I may purchase another one.... I am currently using as an external monitor for my Lenovo X1 Extreme; I'm using DP to USB-C and the monitor is receiving 3840x2160 resolution at 60Hz.
customer_reviews.author: afnav23

customer_reviews.title: 4k at 60 Hz, acceptable image.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. DP at 4k and 60 Hz, sometimes there is blink behaviour and I have to turn it off to start up again. I dont know hat could be, but I'll try to change drivers and resolution and so on. By the moment, happy with it. One problem is the 2 base screws were missing but I have a lot of screws in the garage and I got no problem to replace the missing part. Maybe my next monitor is going to be a 32 inches and at higher refreshing rate!!
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for 4K gaming and PC Usage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this so far with my XBOX 1X at 4K 60 FPS, Nintendo Switch, and PC. All look fantastic on it. This Free sync monitor is G-Sync IS compatible with a 10 series card or higher, and I have loved how sharp the text looks on PC and graphics on Xbox. The switch looks great as well. Great purchase for general use and console gaming. PC gaming looks good, but I prefer a 144hz screen for PC gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Moore

customer_reviews.title: Gaming shows no contrast in dark areas, great for coding/reading.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very dissatisfied with the contrast and ability to read and write code on this monitor. I found that if I typed "HDR" into the search window in the bottom left of my screen, I could switch windows HDR off and in most modes found reading text was perfect. However, I play L4D. In the dark scenes, there is not enough contrast to easily tell the difference between friend or foe. I think the problem is there are so many modes, that I either have not found one that works, or the monitor is defective. I am keeping it an using my old Gateway for games. If you know of good gaming settings, please add a comment?
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Poor design on the back. Cannot mount flush.
customer_reviews.text: Really poor design! Has a VESA mount yes, but there is NO way to mount it flush to the wall. There is a base that connect to the stand that juts out at least 6 inches that you cannot remove from the back. Returning this one. Reached out to LG, and there is no way to remove this.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Color accuracy is really bad
customer_reviews.text: This monitor sounds really good on paper. I thought it would replace my dell U2718Q. The dell by far has better color accuracy and clarity. For some reason, the LG I received made the icons on my dock look pixelated even after switching different cables and messing with the picture settings. I strongly do NOT recommend this for photography / graphic design. Who knows, maybe I just got a bad one. But it’s not worth exchanging for me at this point.. still happy with my dell.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Stuck pixel and left corner yellowing 27UL850
customer_reviews.text: It has a stuck pixel and now the top left corner is starting to show a yellowing tint day by day that didn’t exist before. Really disappointed in the quality of this monitor. LG took a step in the wrong direction in 2019 with the UL line compared to the UK lines from 2018. After returning the UL750 for quality issues, I’m 0-2 with lg panels this year. I’m never buying an lg monitor again.
customer_reviews.author: KRUZ8ER

customer_reviews.title: Monitor stopped powering on.
customer_reviews.text: It was a five star item while it worked. I've had it less than 6 months and it stopped powering on today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4K HDR IPS at Good price
customer_reviews.text: It's been two months since I am using this monitor. Overall, I am glad with my purchase and recommend it. + This is very goods monitor with 4K and HDR support. Various pictures modes work as expected out of the box. Its very good monitor for the money. - It would have been good if the out of the box stand with this monitor was adjustable. If you need heigh adjustable stand, its better idea to spend some extra money and go for the model with adjustable stand. The one that comes with this is very limited. - This HDR content is really good for the price. But, sometime I wish if it could get brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you are planning on mounting this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to mount this monitor above my existing LG 144hz 1440p gaming monitor. However, LG designed this monitor to have the hinge (which you screw the base onto) be attached to the backplate of the monitor. I tried removing this but was told it would void warranty. because of that, I cannot mount a monitor above and angle it because it clashes with my mount. What a disappointment. Such poor design from LG. I think no more LG for me, this is the 3rd LG 4K monitor I have purchased and returned this year due to issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anvesh Gundlapalli

customer_reviews.title: G-Sync Compatible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After the latest Nvidia driver released on January 15th, G-Sync officially work wit all Freesync monitors, including this one. I can confirm that it works beautifully. Only tested it with The Witcher 3, Resident Evil 7, Final Fantasy XV, and Forza Horizon 4. No artifacts whatsoever. The best 4k monitor just became better.
customer_reviews.author: AdamEMC

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider if you are looking for a bright monitor
customer_reviews.text: 4k sounds great, and this monitor claims to be so. Run a diag...compare it to your other monitors. Mine, at least, was way darker than even a 6 y/o AOC standard monitor. Sent it back for refund and customer service screwed me around with it. I will never accept in-store credit again after this and will no longer shop Amazon exclusively for my needs, especially expensive tech items. Amazon = the new Walmart, minus the transparency that most of the items you buy are the cheapest available version. Sorry for the rant - Amazon has betrayed me for the last time.
customer_reviews.author: cbrace

customer_reviews.title: DONT GET IF WANTING 120FPS. Worth it with exceptions
customer_reviews.text: Setting up on xbox one x was a pain at first. For me it didnt register it as 4k hdr. But after a few tries and going in the setting it worked. Id just reboot your xbox when plugged in too it. But other then that the screen is great no tearing sits nice and snug next to the tv and is manageable and comes with a displayport cord and hdmi high speed cord. Its a little bright for late night gaming but its an ips display thats good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Chaysen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible monitor for Mac users.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT A ONE CABLE SOLUTION!!!! When using the USB-C for the display input the other USB ports stop working. Very disappointed. The monitor barely functions via USB-C. If you work an 8 hour day expect to start working 9 hours to make up for the amount of time you'll spend unplugging and plugging this monitor back in. Eventually you give up and reboot your mac then everything is okay until the mac falls asleep again and the connectivity issues return. I'm very disappointed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Moyers

customer_reviews.title: Vesa mount is inlaid with rounded corners
customer_reviews.text: Not really vesa compatible. Tried to use an arm mount and the rounded corners prevent it from attaching. Has a really huge, old school power brick. Also, for the price point I really expected the picture quality to be better. Kind of an “eh, it’ll do” feeling overall, but that’s upsetting considering I could’ve gotten that from a $100 monitor.
customer_reviews.author: alexandanya

customer_reviews.title: Does not power MBP 15in with Catalina 10.15.3
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this monitor if you're using a MBP 2018 15 in and Catalina 10.15.3. This thing gave me so many problems that I lost a weekend trying to get it working. The problems that it faces are many. Keeps flipping between charging and not. Doesn't work with Mac without the power cable. So if you're looking for power from this monitor, not happening. Does work if you want power and video not going over the same line.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: amazing, perfect right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for simultaneous use and they are perfect. color calibration is spot on, text looks amazing. I sold my imac and moved to PC and was worried the monitors wouldn't be as good, but these are amazing. Keep in mind these do NOT have internal speakers, and have limited connections, but if all you use is a displayport like me, than these will save you some coin and provide top notch picture quality. This is I believe the 2019 model. I originally purchased a 2016 model (27UD68-W) and wasn't a big fan of the color calibration or the text.
customer_reviews.author: nyvik

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I have a 4k hdr tv and compair to this gaming monitor! Way better, even my wife who ain’t even a fan of electronic can tell the difference. Might have to adjust the settings to get it the way you like it but that’s how all monitor are. Good do notice some bright light on the top two cononors but ain’t noticeable after playing games or watching movies, only on black n grey.
customer_reviews.author: Boondy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor with MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor that goes well with my MacBook 2019, nice picture, not as good as a retina display but nothing is as good as a retina display, however, this one is good enough. Having a usbc port that connects with the macbook thunderbolt for power and image is a pretty good addition to my workspace (or should I say a pretty good removal of additional cables?). In general, a very good monitor and what I expected for the price, which is more at the higher price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Wladmir

customer_reviews.title: An excellent monitor, with some dead pixels.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, accurate color, great black levels if with some ips glow. (which is totally unavoidable and not a defect) Unfortunately mine had multiple dead pixels so I returned it. I might buy it again later just as it is a VERY good monitor with solid, "true" hdr performance; hdr 400 doesn't clip any hdr detail, it's just not bright enough to blow your socks off exactly like hdr 600 and 1000 panels can and the feature is still a huge draw for me on this panel.
customer_reviews.author: The Ferguson Family

customer_reviews.title: Bright, great color monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor makes reading text on my 13" MacBook Pro much easier. I have tried the duel picture and it works well also. I have not been able to get the software for the monitor's color calibration to work on my Macbook Pro. Hence the four star instead of 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Maury Swoveland

customer_reviews.title: Quick setup and play
customer_reviews.text: This is my first IPS panel from having TN type panels and wow, I've gotta say I like it. I havent really noticed a latency issue in terms of gtg refresh rate, its been solid in games like destiny, rocket league, fallout 76 ( if it doesnt bug out hint hint Bethesda) skyrim looks incredible though. Cant wait for whatever elder scrolls they're currently working on. Huge fan of the series. Anyway anthem looked good on the monitor. Its capable of 4k at 60hz. But the monitor is locked at 60hz for anything. I think. I'm still learning. Good monitor though. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Party

customer_reviews.title: Looks so good!
customer_reviews.text: Set up right out of the box was pretty quick and easy. I feel the adjustability is great. I can place it in a variety of different angles and heights. The picture quality using a displayport cord was fantastic. My computer is a 2017 MacBook Air. It looks great. I'm heavily considering getting another.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: I can just say its the perfect monitor for My PC and Xbox one x. It uses HDR on the fly, which it looks awesome. no need to be fiddling with settings to get it working. I had to set to 2K for my PC since it does not have the power to run games at full 4k. but still all games look much better them my old 1080p monitor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Benjamin Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Great panel, attachments need improvement
customer_reviews.text: The display itself is great. Bright and sharp. Couldn't be happier. The piece that snaps in on the back didn't go in the right way and removing it to try again scratched the plastic. I'd rather screw it in than snap it in. It still doesn't sit right. I hated this part. Also, the section of the power cable that goes to the brick could be longer. Due to the configuration of my desk, the brick has to sit on top and it's a little awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a true gamer
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my Xbox One X. I mainly use it to play video games. Since purchasing this monitor I can tell a difference in the graphics. It has the following features 4K, HDR, VRR, and HMDI 2.1. Highly recommend this for a gamer or graphic designer.
customer_reviews.author: Tamerica

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a monitor snob, but this one is sharp, looks great, worked well out of the gate, and survived a terrifying face-plant off of a tiny writing desk thatI was using in quarantine with only a barely-visible dent in the frame. For what I paid it seems an incredible deal with solid build quality. Great addition to my home office, especially now that I have a more appropriately-sized surface for it to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Gantz Graf

customer_reviews.title: Turned off intermittently without reason.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this monitor after 2 days of intermittent use because it would turn off for several seconds then turn back on when I was using it. No, it was not in screen saver mode, and my computer was not going to sleep. I would be typing or using my mouse and it would turn off. My cables and connections are all good and not moving or being dislodged.
customer_reviews.author: PilotGuy

customer_reviews.title: The monitor is brand new
customer_reviews.text: I like my new monitor very much. It's 4k and the image quality is really good. The monitor base is modern and doesn't consume much space. I contacted the seller asking regarding the product condition. I was told the product is brand new. They listed it as good condition only because the package box was broken. The seller lists their products conservatively.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cai

customer_reviews.title: aRGB and sRGB selection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is a Graphics design major to give her more viewable area than what she has on her Microsoft Book 2 which she can plug into this monitor. Now she has two separate screens to work with. The aRGB and sRGB is a critical feature for design and photo editing and not all monitors have these features.
customer_reviews.author: William W Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Using this monitor on a 2012 Macbook Pro (non-retina)
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit finicky to set up in the beginning as there was an issue with underscan/overscan when using HDMI. Eventually, switching from mini-DP to DP helped. Now I sometimes find that disconnecting the cable and later reconnecting leads to underscan again. However this is easily resolved by putting the macbook to sleep and starting it up again. It can be finicky with older computers, but given the generational gap between my 2012 macbook and this monitor, I’d say the compatibility is close enough and relatively manageable. For newer computers such as my Elitebook, the monitor works seamlessly 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Stewie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together I see why people say it shakes a lot it doesn’t bother me so much but works great for the price I will update later maybe Update. Idk if my screen was broken or my computer is broken but one other is not working. I don’t have another monitor to check tho probably update after I test another monitor out
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jaber

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect monitor for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor. I wanted a nice 4k screen for doing work during the day that had the ability to be used with my Xbox One X and PS4 Pro for evenings and weekends. The picture is amazing. Looks for better than my TV with 4k and HDR. Would recommend for anyone but PC gamers since the refresh is only 60 hz.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lenoir

customer_reviews.title: Avoid This Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with new iMac Mini in November and was initially impressed. Two months later the right 1/3 of the screen isn't working. After days of trying to solve the problem with online support and LG support I was required to send it back to LG for warranty service. I received my "fixed" monitor back after waiting almost three months and all I have is an expensive door stop. The display is completely black and I get an annoying beep to inform me that it's powered on, nothing else.. What a waste of $$ and LG is completely useless if you require support!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus C

customer_reviews.title: Great for programming on MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor as a dual monitor setup. I use mainly for programming on my MacBook Pro. I run the usb-c directly to and from the monitors and everything works seamlessly. I have 4 usb-c inputs on my Mac and only need 2 for each 4K monitor. Perfectly happy with my setup. If I had a bigger desk I would get a 3rd!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Stand Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Who at LG was the Dumb Bass who designed the mount so the circular mount slopes forward into the work area? Further, the right part of the circular foot is exactly where I move my mouse. My mouse is constantly butting into the monitor base. Bought this two years ago and I've had it. I'm planning to swap it out for a Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Rwpauli

customer_reviews.title: Can't Ask For Anything Better for $500
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem was trying to find a high resolution monitor with a good (loud enough) pair of speakers. So combining 27", 4K, IPS and a good pair a speakers so you don't need a sound bar/external speakers, this was perfect. It's 60 Hz, so FPS gamers might not like it, but that's not what this is for. And 144 Hz at 4K is like 3x the price. Plus you get entry HDR and USB-C too. Can't really do any better than everything this monitor does for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M

customer_reviews.title: Has a power brick like a twenty year old laptop, not in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Uses a power brick with a 3' cable and barrel connector. Not compatible with vesa monitor arms unless they're very, very short. Uses old unreliable C5 and barrel power connectors like something from the 90s. Very out of date and awkward looking.
customer_reviews.author: Crissa Kentavr

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k monitor for one X
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Did a side by side 4k test with another 4k monitor that had the 1 ms response time and there was no competition. If you are in the market for a 4k monitor you are already concerned with visuals, this is an easy option if you're not concerned with going huge with your monitor or curved, and a fair amount of customizable screen settings are available. Menu button is easy to use, havent had any issues so far, and the itself is very stable. I use it with my xbox one x and I'm not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first monitor and I use it to connect my Mac to for bigger viewing screen. Loving it so far and can't want to start playing games and watching hd movies with this monitor. Adjust by tilting up and down, I wish it can tilt side to side. There is also no volume output, but I use a harman speaker so that sound quality is still on point.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My needs are pretty simple -- it's for software development on a Linux Mint system. No gaming, no difficult lighting conditions. Read reviews to decide if it fits your situation. It's great for mine. It's not as good as the Dell P2715Q that was the acknowledged best but is now not available for a reasonable price, but it's at or near the top for monitors that are now available in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Pinball Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor on the Market (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.text: I don't play games on computer (which is the only reason I didn't rate for gaming), but this monitor is fantastic. Bright, vivid colors, variety of connections (HDMIx2, DP, and Type-C. Fast, easy setup. I wish that the base didn't take up so much desktop. HDR-setting is superb. A bit more expensive than other LG monitors, but worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Woodward (Texas)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything from a gaming perspective, I've been using this monitor for about a month now with a mid-2015 macbook pro using a Amazon basics mini-display port to display port cable. I'm running it at native 4k for software development and for zoom sessions. Picture quality looks great, and haven't found any problem pixels. I don't think I could go back to <4k again - it's a real productivity booster.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor. I use one with Xbox One X
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I use one with Xbox One X, and a couple connected to my MBP. As monitors they work great: great viewing angles, and very nice menus and controls. Gaming is excellent and the colors definitely pop and look better than on my pretty high end 4K Samsung. Not connecting the Xbox to the tv ever again. Concerning the brightness: this comes in fairly low in terms of HDR standards (450nits max), but to my eyes, this monitor is very, very bright.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues with LG in the past and swore I would never buy there product again but I was looking for a monitor to play my xbox one x on and this monitor was a number one pick on a bunch of reviews and also had a good rating so I took a chance on it and I am glad I did. This monitor is like a night and day difference in game play from my 65" samsung curve tv. Mostly play pubg on it and I can tell the performance difference in this monitor from my tv with the low input lag and the free sync tech.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for for my xbox.
customer_reviews.text: I tried a curved monitor a few days ago and the quality was horrible. Did a little more research and landed on this beauty. I don't think you can get full 4k on console but it may be the HDMI cord I was using. Even so, picture and color were so perfect. It's what I've been looking for all this time for my xbox. I have it mounted on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Thoughts After 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: I like that the screen has two HDMI ports so I can connect to my PC and XBOX One X. 4k is really nice and I used this monitor for work and play. However, I noticed that the left corner the screen is fading and is a different color than the rest of the screen. Guess these things aren't made to last. Good monitor, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: B Duff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice USB Monitorl
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced USB-C monitor, and came across this one as a warehouse deal in "like new condition" at significantly less than the new price. I am very pleased with the picture quality, and, as others have noted, the brightness is great. The USB C port effectively charges my HP Elitebook x360 G2 notebook, so that was a bonus- one less cord to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: InHouseCounsel

customer_reviews.title: A solid 4K display with plenty of input sources.
customer_reviews.text: Single USB C connection for power/video/sound/data is very convenient. Lots of connectivity options with 2 HDMI, Display Port and USB C. Picture was quite bright, lots of picture control settings through the on-display menu. Speakers had good volume and are fine for most uses.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I use this on MacBook pro (2020). I also use bootcamp. The display is Excellent for both MacOS and windows, for work and gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Sexy Beast
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this for a Xbox one x setup in my bedroom so the wife could watch tv while I played and it works amazing but then guess what Xbox got woke with there non free speech platform and I traded that hot garbage for a Nintendo switch let me say that system is 1.amazing and 2. The games look phenomenal in hdr effect mode try it with Zelda trust.
customer_reviews.author: Draven Snow

customer_reviews.title: OK product. USB port doesn't have power support!
customer_reviews.text: This overpriced monitor does not provide enough power in their USB ports which led your USB device can't connect on the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Haoda Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor for use with my MacBook Pro, specifically for editing photos, and for research work when I have multiple windows/applications open between my MBP and the monitor. Coupled with a port replicator, this I’d as excellent solution when working at my desk. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: JB
